id.description: Id of the query answer. Id is a composed from queryPageId and queryReplyId by joining them with minus sign (e.g. 123-456)

queryId.description: Query's id where the comment is

queryPageId.description: Query page's id or null if category is query scoped

hidden.description: Whether the comment has been hided by the manager

queryPageId.description: Page's id where the comment is

stampId.description: Panel stamp id. Defaults to current stamp

expertiseGroupIds.description: Include only speficied expertise group ids

panelUserGroupIds.description: Include only speficied panel user group ids

commentCategoryIds.description: Include only comments from speficied comment category ids

show2dAs1d.description: Show 2d answers as 1d graphs instead of 2d graphs

emails.description: List of emails the invitation will be sent to

targetQueryId.description: Specify target query for invitation link. If this is left blank, link will lead to panel index page

skipInvitation.description: If skip invitation is true, users will be added directly without invitation

password.description: Initial password for users. This field is used only when skipInvitation is true
